app_descript:
Brief: Ampol is a dynamic app tailored for motorists looking to optimize their fueling experience. It integrates the convenience of tracking and using Everyday Rewards points, locating service stations, and benefiting from referral savings, all accessible from the palm of your hand.

  • ğŸš— FuelPay: Enable payment for fuel directly via the app at participating stations, making transactions smoother and quicker. ğŸ’³
  • ğŸ’Œ Referral Program: Save on fuel by referring friends to Ampol. Once your friend completes their first fill-up, you get a discount per litre on your next purchase. ğŸ¤
